name: Red-Eyes Dark Dragoon Girl
text: Dark Magician Girl + 1 Red-Eyes monster. When this card is Fusion Summoned you can target 1 of the mosters used as material for this cards fusion summon in your GY; return that target to your hand. This card gains 300 ATK for each Red-Eyes and Dark Magician monster in the GY. While this monster is on the field your opponent cannot target anyother "Dragoon" monsters you control for a atk.
